client.facade

Class ClientFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.facade.ClientFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUserFacade

    public class ClientFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUserFacade
    The Facade for the Controllers/Views interacting with the Model classes. The only class to directly touch the Model classes will be the Facade. Everything else will call the Facade to do actions. This class contains all available communications with the model.

        public void buildClientPlayerFromPlayerInfos(java.util.List<PlayerInfo> players)
        Used to fill in the clientPlayer's info from the list of PlayerInfos.
        Parameters:
        players - the info of each of the players. Typically, this is supplied by GameInfo#getPlayerInfos().
        Pre-Conditions:
        The clientPlayer has already been initialized with a name and an ID.

      • canPlaceRoad

        public boolean canPlaceRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc,
                            boolean allowDisconnected)
        Checks to see if the player meets the conditions to place a road
        Parameters:
        edgeLoc - the location of the Road
        allowDisconnected - whether or not the road is being placed in the setup round.
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the player has the required resources and the location is vacant and the player owns a settlement or city at a neighboring vertex location
        Pre-Conditions:
        place road is called
        Post-Conditions:
        place road continues

      • canBuyRoad

        public boolean canBuyRoad()
        Determines if the client player can buy a road.
        Returns:
        true if the player can buy a road, false otherwise.

      • canPlaceSettlement

        public boolean canPlaceSettlement(VertexLocation vertexLocation,
                                  boolean allowDisconnected)
        Checks to see if the player meets the condition to place a settlement
        Parameters:
        vertexLocation - the location of the Vertex
        allowDisconnected - whether or not the settlement is being placed in the setup round.
        Returns:
        boolean - true if player has the required resources and the location is 2 edges or more from another settlement
        Pre-Conditions:
        place settlement is called
        Post-Conditions:
        place settlement continues

      • canBuySettlement

        public boolean canBuySettlement()
        Checks to see if the player meets the condition to buy a settlement.
        Returns:
        if the player meets the requirements, false otherwise.

      • canPlaceCity

        public boolean canPlaceCity(VertexLocation location)
        Checks to see if the player meets the condition to place a city
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the City
        Returns:
        boolean - true if player has the required resources and the player owns the settlement at that location
        Pre-Conditions:
        place city is called
        Post-Conditions:
        place city continues

      • canBuyCity

        public boolean canBuyCity()
        Checks to see if the player meets the condition to buy a city.
        Returns:
        true if the player meets all the conditions to buy a city, false otherwise.

      • canPlaceRobber

        public boolean canPlaceRobber(HexLocation location)
        Checks to see if player meets the condition to move the robber
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the hex
        Returns:
        true if a seven has been rolled and the location is viable
        Pre-Conditions:
        place robber is called
        Post-Conditions:
        place city continues

      • placeRoad

        public void placeRoad(EdgeLocation location,
                      boolean isFree)
        player purchases and places a road
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the road
        isFree - whether or not the road is free to place.
        Pre-Conditions:
        player clicks on a location to place road
        Post-Conditions:
        player met conditions and road is on map

      • placeSettlement

        public void placeSettlement(VertexLocation location,
                            boolean isFree)
        player purchases and places a settlement
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the Settlement
        isFree - whether or not the settlement is free to place.
        Pre-Conditions:
        player clicks on a location to place a settlement
        Post-Conditions:
        player met conditions and settlement is now on map

      • placeCity

        public void placeCity(VertexLocation location)
        player purchases and places a city at a location specified
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the City
        Pre-Conditions:
        player clicks to build on a location
        Post-Conditions:
        a city is now owned by the player

      • robPlayer

        public void robPlayer(RobPlayerInfo victim,
                      HexLocation location)
        Robs a player, player receives one resource from the player being robbed
        Parameters:
        victim - the victim of the brutal armed robbery
        location - the new location of the robber.
        Pre-Conditions:
        robber is placed
        Post-Conditions:
        player has an extra resource

                              ResourceType outputResource)

        Parameters:

        outputResource - the resourec the client player is receiving.

        public static void resetInstance()
        Resets the instance of the facade to null. It saves the proxy so that the client still has their cookie set.
